entries.description: Policy Checks selected profile is always default
From the Lambda treeview in AWS Explorer, you can now right-click on a function name and start a CloudWatch Logs Live Tail sessions for the selected function.

EC2 is now available in AWS Explorer:

1. Remote-connect VSCode to your EC2 instances.
2. Open terminal to your EC2 instances.
3. Start, stop, and visit the Launch page.
